name: Solitaire — Classic Card Game
description:
Classic Solitaire you used to play on your computer. Now available on iPad and iPhone. The app allows you quickly dive into the game, the rules are very simple.

The goal is to move all cards to Foundations, stacking them from Aces to King: А, 2, 3, 4, 5, and so on.

Move cards from one stack to another in descending order: 2 can be placed over 3, 3 over 4, and so on. Red cards may be placed only over black cards, black ones — only over red. Only Kings van by placed to an empty place.

If you had stuck, tap the deck in the upper-right corner to get extra cards.

Solitaire is:

Simple, intuitive interface. You can enjoy this addictive card game regardless of your previous gaming experience.
Daily challenges that allow you to earn Gold Stars. Collect all the stars for a month and win a monthly reward!
Cancellations and hints. These features will help you get out of impasses.
System of points and levels. Shape and sharpen your strategy with each new game, earn points, move on to more difficult stages, and beat your high scores!
